# Hostel Brikette
> Cliff-top hostel in Positano, Italy — panoramic Amalfi Coast views.

## Machine-readable sources
- [Daily rates](/data/rates.json) — 6-month calendar, hourly updates
- [OpenAPI spec](/.well-known/openapi.yaml)
- [AI plugin manifest](/.well-known/ai-plugin.json)

## Key destinations & operators
- Positano · Amalfi · Salerno · Sorrento · Ravello · Naples
- Transit: SITA buses along the Amalfi Coast
